actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the U. S. Postal Service from reducing the frequency of weekly mail delivery service below the frequency in effect on March 15, l977.

summary.text: Prohibits the United States Postal Service from reducing the frequency of weekly mail delivery service below the frequency in effect on March 15, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the U. S. Postal Service from reducing the frequency of weekly mail delivery service below the frequency in effect on March 15, l977.
